channel.title: Sources on Sylvain's videography blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sources on Sylvain's videography blog

item.title: My digital awareness sources
item.description: Where do I find resources related to videography? As a filmmaker, there are so many aspects that you need to learn in order to master this skill. Nowadays, most filmmakers learn from reading information on the internet. I’m actually learning the same way; I feel like other people’s experiences are worth a lot, because you can avoid doing the mistakes they made, and thus save time in the process of learning this skill.
